sections.Resolution:
Several days, the crime group came to the Kayaki's residence and demands to pay them for the lost money because of Reisuke, which she pretends to be afraid of them to accept their demands and joining their group where Usui and Takaki Kooriyama were part of them. After the case, Sakura offers to turn herself to the Police and testify against the crime group while Sango arrests Maika.
Later that evening, the same crime group appeared and Takaki attempted to attack them, but Subaru incapacitates him and then orders Rumi to take Sakura and the Detective Boys to a safe place while defeats them. During the Confrontation, Rumi hears Subaru's words that reminded her of the similarities with Tsutomu from 17 years ago. Subaru begins to fight the crime group while Rumi locks the Sakura and the Detective Boys inside and deliberately breaks the knob after running away where she defeats rest of them instantly.
- Criminal gang leader
sections.Manga to anime changes:
- In manga, Conan tuned into several TV channels to check if there is any news that broadcast videos recorded by people using smartphone which shows the situation when the hotel was evacuated. In the anime, Conan only watches one TV channel.
- Some dialogue was added in the anime:
- Haibara reminding Conan that he is not a child, and he should correct his own conduct of playing with smartphone in the middle of class cleaning.
- Rumi asking Detective Boys to finish the cleaning together after planning the trip to the beach.
- Sakura making sure that the order is for the Yaiba Tornado Wiener.
